title: Vaz (Padre Fernando Carlos de Meneses )
body:
Padre Fernando Carlos de Meneses. Born in the parish of Santana on February 1, 1884. He attended the Seminary of this diocese and was ordained a priest in 1909. He is currently the parish priest of the Porto da Cruz parish. In the Correio da Madeira, he published well-elaborated articles containing historical information about some parishes in the north of this island. In the parish archive of Faial, he recently discovered the birth record of the illustrious Madeiran Jo達o Fernandes Vieira, the parish of his birth being previously unknown, despite the painstaking investigations that had been made in that regard (1921).

Padre Fernando Vaz, who devotes his leisure time to various genealogical studies intended for publication, is the grandson of the distinguished Madeiran genealogist Jo達o Agostinho Pereira de Agrela (volume I, page 20 and volume II, page 435).

Santana: Birthplace of Padre Fernando Carlos de Meneses

Padre Fernando Carlos de Meneses: Parish priest of Porto da Cruz, grandson of the distinguished Madeiran genealogist Jo達o Agostinho Pereira de Agrela

1884: Birth of Padre Fernando Carlos de Meneses
1909: Ordination of priest of Padre Fernando Carlos de Meneses
1921: Discovery of the birth record of the illustrious Madeiran Jo達o Fernandes Vieira
